page1.title: About Me
page1.content: I’m a data scientist and systematic trader on a personal account. . Brief resume: . 2021 - present: Data Scientist @ Argus Media, development of forecast models for commodity markets; . | 2019 - 2020: Research Associate @ Imperial College London, machine learning applications in physics; . | 2014 - 2018: PhD in Physics @ University of Lisbon, machine learning description of turbulence; . | . For more information check the links in the bottom of this page… .
